      santoriniGUI - the santoriniGUI to associate to this
      availableCards - the List of available cards
      numberOfPlayers - the number of the players of the match

    • setjPanelCards

      public void setjPanelCards​(int n)
      Refresh the jPanelCards after to be called by PrevLabel or NextLabel removing the 4 old cards and adding new 4 cards. Only cards selected are created maintaining the same Card instance connected.

      Parameters:
      n - is the number from start to show cards
